Start by selecting one of the Add Features options on the left-side menu to add a feature.

Each option will prompt for certain inputs and then generate a script which will appear here. Multiple script snippets can be added.

Once snippets have been added, they can be edited, rearranged and deleted. When done, File options from the menu allow for saving the script, reloading from file and copying it to clipboard.

If a specific option replacement across all script snippets has to be done, the Replace section can be used.

The four buttons at the top can be used at any time to convert the script snippets to a specific execution format.

Asbench load scripts

Wait for asbench to complete

Sleep X seconds

Kill asbench
